text: ai eemaanadaaron bahut se gumaan (bad) se bache raho kyon ki baaz badagumaanee gunaah hain aur aapas mein ek doosare ke haal kee toh mein na raha karo aur na tumamen se ek doosare kee geebat kare kya tumamen se koee is baat ko pasand karega ki apane mare hue bhaee ka gosht khae to tum usase (zaroor) napharat karoge aur khuda se daro, beshak khuda bada tauba qubool karane vaala meharabaan hai
